hooter noun
(DEVICE)
[ C ] old-fashioned an electrical device that makes a loud noise, often to mark the start or end of work at a factory

hooter noun
(BREASTS)
hooters [ plural ] US slang
a woman's breasts. This use of the word is considered offensive.
